channel.title: CVE Feed for vaadin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vaadin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-25027|2024-08-05T03:00:19.062Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Missing output sanitization in default RouteNotFoundError view in com.vaadin:flow-server versions 1.0.0 through 1.0.10 (Vaadin 10.0.0 through 10.0.13), and 1.1.0 through 1.4.2 (Vaadin 11.0.0 through 13.0.5) allows attacker to execute malicious JavaScript via crafted URL

item.title: CVE-2018-25007|2024-08-05T12:26:39.439Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Missing check in UIDL request handler in com.vaadin:flow-server versions 1.0.0 through 1.0.5 (Vaadin 10.0.0 through 10.0.7, and 11.0.0 through 11.0.2) allows attacker to update element property values via crafted synchronization message.

item.title: CVE-2019-25028|2024-08-05T03:00:18.983Z -- vaadin -- vaadin
item.description: Missing variable sanitization in Grid component in com.vaadin:vaadin-server versions 7.4.0 through 7.7.19 (Vaadin 7.4.0 through 7.7.19), and 8.0.0 through 8.8.4 (Vaadin 8.0.0 through 8.8.4) allows attacker to inject malicious JavaScript via unspecified vector
